argumentText:
ARGUMENT
m

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ismgmALT.b | |- B = ( Base ` M ) |
| 2 |  | ismgmALT.o | |- .o. = ( +g ` M ) |
| 3 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( m = M -> ( +g ` m ) = ( +g ` M ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( m = M -> ( Base ` m ) = ( Base ` M ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_breq12d | |- ( m = M -> ( ( +g ` m ) comLaw ( Base ` m ) <-> ( +g ` M ) comLaw ( Base ` M ) ) ) |
| 6 | 2, 1 | #P_breq12i | |- ( .o. comLaw B <-> ( +g ` M ) comLaw ( Base ` M ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl6bbr | |- ( m = M -> ( ( +g ` m ) comLaw ( Base ` m ) <-> .o. comLaw B ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_df-csgrp2 | |- CSGrpALT = { m e. SGrpALT | ( +g ` m ) comLaw ( Base ` m ) } |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_elrab2 | |- ( M e. CSGrpALT <-> ( M e. SGrpALT /\ .o. comLaw B ) ) |
